attributes.additional_details: The e-Petition website provides the public with an effective voice that is heard by our Government - but that voice is muted by the constant website CRASHES and SERVER ERROR messages, which prevent the public from voicing or voting on issues which directly concern them. This e-Petition simply calls on the Government to invest in a website that is fit for purpose - and enable a high volume of people to concurrently sign or create e-Petitions.
